Text:
this is for JTAG or RGH only.

The full retail DVD will be out on (or before for us early birds) Dec 4  :D  Power to LT+ !!
Def cant wait to play it off my wasabi 360 the downloads from x box live glitch like crazy tryin to play this game even on the I pad 2 and android asus.

can someone please tell me where to put every file? i've played the first episode and i cant install the rest of them.
There is the internal disk where is isntalled the freestyle dashboard etc and where i put the dlc content , the 4gb memory for my saves and the external disk where i put the games and the xbla.
So i need the right path.Plz guys!!!

Jtag is a type of hack for 360. As far as where to put it, hdd1content 00000000whatever numbered folder is in this archive. Then use freestyle to grab the latest title update by using options for each game in Frestyle3.
